question: 尋找資料欄位裡跟機台當機相關的問題
sql:
SELECT * FROM Rootcauses
                  WHERE D4_DESC LIKE '%機台當機%' OR
                        D4_ROOTCAUSE LIKE '%機台當機%' OR
                        D4_ROOTCAUSEESC LIKE '%機台當機%' OR
                        D4_WHY1ESC LIKE '%機台當機%' OR
                        D4_WHY2ESC LIKE '%機台當機%' OR
                        D4_WHY3ESC LIKE '%機台當機%' OR
                        D4_WHY4ESC LIKE '%機台當機%' OR
                        D4_WHY5ESC LIKE '%機台當機%'
